title: Issue 47 Scenario 3 Expected Behavior
details:
SCENARIO 3: Pinning Quick Tabs to a Tab

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
- Pin button toggles between pinned and unpinned states
- Pinned Quick Tabs only appear on their designated page
- Unpinned Quick Tabs appear globally across all tabs
- Pin/unpin actions are broadcast to all tabs
- pinnedToUrl field stores the URL pattern where Quick Tab is pinned

TEST IMPLEMENTATION:
- Create Quick Tab and pin to page 1
- Verify pinnedToUrl field is set
- Open page 2 and verify pinned tab behavior
- Unpin and verify global visibility restored
- Tests page-specific vs global visibility

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Pinned tabs must not leak to other pages
- pinnedToUrl must accurately reflect pinning state
- Unpin must restore global visibility immediately
